actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fishermen's Protective Act of 1967 in order to authorize the President to prohibit the importation of any products from a country whose nationals are conducting fishing operations in a manner which diminishes the effectiveness of an international fishery conservation program.

summary.text: Authorizes the President, under the Fishermen's Protective Act, to prohibit the importation of any products from a country whose nationals are conducting fishing operations in a manner which diminishes the effectiveness of an international fishery conservation program. (Amends 22 U.S.C. 1978)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fishermen's Protective Act of 1967 in order to authorize the President to prohibit the importation of any products from a country whose nationals are conducting fishing operations in a manner which diminishes the effectiveness of an international fishery conservation program.
